department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Cleaning and maintenance services for CFB Halifax stacks
description: Cleaning and maintenance services for the stacks at the Canadian Forces Base Halifax
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Solicitation Title
Stack Cleaning, Inspection and Repairs at CFB Halifax

#### Solicitation Reference Number
WS4093682522-Doc4093716595

#### Tender Status
SATR - Solicitation Amendment to Result (Expired)

#### Key Information
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-05T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-01
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia

#### Solicitation Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is requesting services for the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to conduct the annual inspection, provision of videos and reports, cleaning, and repairs of stacks at various locations within CFB Halifax. The solicitation is a Competitive Bid.

#### MTO/SCO Requirements
* UNSPSC Code: 72101500 - Building maintenance and repair services
* UNSPSC Description: Building maintenance and repair services

#### Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: Kate Mintzer
* Contact Email: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Title: 

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated based on their response to the solicitation requirements. The lowest-priced bid will be awarded the contract.

#### Important Requirements
* All inquiries related to this solicitation must be submitted in writing to the contracting authority five (5) days prior to the closing date.
* Please refer to the solicitation specification for complete details on the requirements.

Please don't change the content, only rephrase and reorganize the text to a proper markdown format. As well, keep the word count into 400-words for your written output.  Do not ramble or add anything extraneous. Also, proofread it and correct grammatical and spelling errors before providing the output. Let me know if there are any issues.
